parameter.name: discountQuantity
parameter.description: Number of offered quantity for discount.

parameter.name: applyOn
parameter.description: The invoice items for which the discounts need to be applied.

parameter.name: planConstraint
parameter.description: Plans the coupon can be applied to.

parameter.name: addonConstraint
parameter.description: Addons the coupon can be applied to.

parameter.name: planIds
parameter.description: List of IDs of the plans.

parameter.name: addonIds
parameter.description: List of IDs of the addons.

parameter.name: durationType
parameter.description: Specifies the time duration the coupon is applicable.

parameter.name: durationMonth
parameter.description: The duration in months for the coupon to be applied.

parameter.name: validTill
parameter.description: Date upto which the coupon can be applied to new subscriptions.

parameter.name: maxRedemptions
parameter.description: Maximum number of times the coupon can be redeemed.
